About

I'm a builder who gravitates toward early-stage products and thoughtful engineering craft. My recent work spans reliable backends, data-informed experimentation, and user journeys that feel polished without being flashy.

Lately, I've been leading delivery for services that power billing and account growth, mentoring engineers, and pushing teams toward pragmatic quality. Outside work you'll find me roasting coffee, sketching product flows, and digging into system design papers.

Years experience 7+
Focus Backend · Platform · Product
Location Remote · PST
